sections.title: ﻿Uses
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>temporarily relieves these symptoms due to hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies:</item>
                     <item>runny nose </item>
                     <item>itchy, watery eyes</item>
                     <item>sneezing </item>
                     <item>itching of the nose or throat</item>
                     <item>temporarily relieves these symptoms due to the common cold:</item>
                     <item>runny nose</item>
                     <item>sneezing</item>
                  </list>
                  <paragraph/>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: temporarily relieves these symptoms due to hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies: runny nose itchy, watery eyes sneezing itching of the nose or throat temporarily relieves these symptoms due to the common cold: runny nose sneezing

sections.title: OTC - DO NOT USE SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Do not use</content>
                  </paragraph>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>to make a child sleepy</item>
                     <item>with any other product containing diphenhydramine, even one used on skin</item>
                  </list>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Do not use to make a child sleepy with any other product containing diphenhydramine, even one used on skin

sections.title: OTC - ASK DOCTOR SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Ask a doctor before use if you have</content>
                  </paragraph>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>a breathing problem such as emphysema or chronic bronchitis</item>
                     <item>trouble urinating due to an enlarged prostate gland</item>
                     <item>glaucoma</item>
                  </list>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Ask a doctor before use if you have a breathing problem such as emphysema or chronic bronchitis trouble urinating due to an enlarged prostate gland glaucoma

sections.title: OTC - ASK DOCTOR/PHARMACIST SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use</content>if you are taking sedatives or tranquilizers

 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if you are taking sedatives or tranquilizers

sections.title: OTC - WHEN USING SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">When using this product</content>
                  </paragraph>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>marked drowsiness may occur</item>
                     <item>avoid alcoholic drinks</item>
                     <item>alcohol, sedatives and tranquilizers may increase drowsiness</item>
                     <item>be careful when driving a motor vehicle or operating machinery</item>
                     <item>excitability may occur, especially in children</item>
                  </list>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: When using this product marked drowsiness may occur avoid alcoholic drinks alcohol, sedatives and tranquilizers may increase drowsiness be careful when driving a motor vehicle or operating machinery excitability may occur, especially in children

sections.display: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.title: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">If pregnant or breast-feeding,</content>ask a health professional before use.

 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use.

sections.display: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.title: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Keep out of reach of children.</content> In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center (1-800-222-1222) right away.

 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Keep out of reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center (1-800-222-1222) right away.

sections.title: Directions
sections.text_xhtml:
take every 4 to 6 hours, or as directed by a doctor do not take more than 6 times in 24 hours 
adults and children 12 years and over 1 to 2 tablets
children 6 to under 12 years 1 tablet
children under 6 years do not use
sections.text_plain: take every 4 to 6 hours, or as directed by a doctor do not take more than 6 times in 24 hours adults and children 12 years and over 1 to 2 tablets children 6 to under 12 years 1 tablet children under 6 years do not use

sections.title: Other information
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <list listType="unordered">
                     <item>
                        <content styleCode="bold">each tablet contains:</content>calcium 25 mg
 
  </item>
                     <item>store between 20-25° C (68-77° F)</item>
                     <item>protect from moisture and light</item>
                  </list>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: each tablet contains: calcium 25 mg store between 20-25° C (68-77° F) protect from moisture and light

sections.title: Inactive ingredients
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>dibasic calcium phosphate, colloidal silicon dioxide, croscarmellose sodium, FD&C red #3, hypromellose, magnesium stearate, microcrystalline cellulose, polyethylene glycol, talc, titanium dioxide</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: dibasic calcium phosphate, colloidal silicon dioxide, croscarmellose sodium, FD&C red #3, hypromellose, magnesium stearate, microcrystalline cellulose, polyethylene glycol, talc, titanium dioxide
